official-title.#text: To prohibit regulations establishing certain limits for the school lunch program, and for other purposes.

committee-name.#text: Committee on Education and the Workforce

cosponsor.#tail: ) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the

short-title.#text: Reducing Federal Mandates on School Lunch Act

has determined, in a manner consistent with school district operational procedures, that the school food authority is not capable of operating a food service program without increased costs as a result of complying with any or all of such rules and regulations.
